Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock, Pact of the Blade invocation

Your pact weapon is improved in the following ways.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use your pact weapon as a Spellcasting Focus for your Warlock spells and you can perform the Somatic components of spells even when your hands are full as long as at least one hand is wielding your pact weapon.

Magical Bonus. In addition, the pact weapon gains a +1 bonus to its attack and damage rolls, unless it is a magic weapon that already has a bonus to those rolls. Beginning at level 7 in Warlock the pact weapon bonus increases to +2. Finally at level 11 in Warlock the pact weapon bonus increases to +3.

Additional Weapons. Finally, the weapon you conjure can be a shortbow, longbow, light crossbow, or heavy crossbow.

Returning Weapon. If your pact weapon has the thrown property, it returns to your hand immediately after it is used to make a ranged attack roll.
